title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 131/84 of 17 January 1984 on the classification of goods in subheading 27.03 A of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 131/84
of 17 January 1984
on the classification of goods in subheading 27.03 A of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Mixtures of peat containing not less than 75 % turf by weight) and other substances such as farmyard manure, lime, sand, rotted leaf mould and very small quantities of other fertilizers, with a total content of potassium (calculated as K2O), nitrogen, phosphorus (calculated as P2O5) not exceeding 1 % by weight, shall be classified in the Common Customs Tariff under the following subheading:
27.03 Peat (including peat litter), whether or not agglomerated:
A. Peat

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 January 1983.
For the Commission
Antonio GIOLITTI
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 14, 21. 1. 1969, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 172, 22. 7. 1968, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 313, 14. 11. 1983, p. 1.
